thread.title: Ron S. - Cleveland APL
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Ron S. - Cleveland APL

author: Ron S. - Cleveland APL
title: Ron S. - Cleveland APL
text: I submitted my number on the chat option. Due to time constraints, I did not have time to live chat. I left the web page and headed to my appointment. Upon returning to my office, the phone rang. It was Art asking what he can do to help me. He worked out everything I needed to complete and I had a follow up call within the hour. Thank you Art!
